title-group.article-title: HIGH PRECISION COMPUTATION OF A CONSTANT IN THE THEORY OF TRIGONOMETRIC SERIES

abstract.p: Using the bisection as well as the Newton-Raphson method, we compute to high precision the Littlewood-Salem-Izumi constant frequently occurring in the theory of trigonometric sums.
